snippet: Security Council ambassadors on Wednesday began trying to negotiate a compromise resolution on Syria, with the bartering focused in good part on the conditions under which President Bashar al-Assad could be asked to cede power.
abstract: Security Council ambassadors begin trying to negotiate a compromise resolution on Syria, with bartering focused in good part on the conditions under which Pres Bashar al-Assad could be asked to cede power.

byline.contributor: Nada Bakri contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: Security Council ambassadors on Wednesday began trying to negotiate a compromise resolution on Syria, with the bartering focused in good part on the conditions under which President Bashar al-Assad could be asked to cede power.

headline.main: Diplomats at U.N. Haggle With Russia Toward a Compromise on Syria
headline.print_headline: Diplomats at U.N. Haggle With Russia Toward a Compromise on Syria
